summary: Pragmatic implementation: +155 lines, -1056 lines. Simple cleanup function, no over-engineering. Two minor findings.

issues.title: Shutdown comment documents absence of functionality
issues.why: Comment '# Shutdown (nothing needed currently)' is speculative documentation. If nothing is needed, don't document that fact.
issues.fix: Remove the shutdown comment. The empty yield section after startup is sufficient for FastAPI lifespan pattern.
issues.verify: Confirm no future shutdown logic is planned. If planned, this comment is still unnecessary (just add the logic when needed).

issues.title: Tests verify SQL implementation details vs behavior
issues.why: Tests 4-5 assert SQL string content ('error_message = ' and 'completed_at = NOW()'). These break if SQL changes but behavior is identical. Testing implementation rather than outcome.
issues.fix: Consider consolidating tests 1/4/5 into single test that verifies SQL contains necessary fields without checking exact syntax. Current granularity is defensible given criticality.
issues.verify: Is test granularity preference or is consolidation acceptable?
